Parts.A: Q_WELCOME

Oh, so we meet again. Thought I had forgotten about you, dear Exile. You still have a debt to repay - and you will do so in prison. Guard!

  (( You are being thrown into prison. Other players may get you out - or you can try to find another *good* soul ))
Q_WELCOME
Q_WELCOME

Well hello there, my Exiled friend! It has come to my attention that you managed to help Lucy in her entrepreneurial endeavours. I usually prefer my woman to be a bit more subservient, but as a man of culture, I can appreciate someone with her talents.

  Now that your first task is done we should see how we can put your talents to good use yet again.
Parts.B: More tasks? I thought that was it!

Parts.A:
Yes. More tasks indeed! A life's debt is hardly repaid by one single act of good faith, is it?

  Now, to the matter at hand. Ever since I established my operation here, we have been plagued by giant pesky snakes and grey rhinos. Dispatch a few of them for me. And bring their heads and blood to Bugsy. He is right outside, selling horses and camels and whatnot.

  Actually, now that I think about it. I think I saw a rhino calf last time I passed by them. Snatch that up after you dealt with it's parents. And bring it to Bugsy, too.

  ((Hint: Get one Grey Rhino Head, one Rhino Calf and three demon blood. All of these can be found either near Muriela's Deceit or throughout the Exiled Lands.))
Q_WELCOME
Q_LASHO
Q_WELCOME
Q_LASHO
Parts.N: Has accepted quest, but did not turn in items with Bugsy

Parts.A: Welcome, welcome my dear Exile. I trust you are hard at work at dispatching this pesky wildlife.
Parts.B: What did you want me to do again?

Parts.A:
The snakes! And the Rhinos! Perhaps I should not have entrusted you with this. You are supposed to kill them and bring their heads and blood to Bugsy!

  ((Hint: Get one Grey Rhino Head, one Rhino Calf and three demon blood. All of these can be found either near Muriela's Deceit or throughout the Exiled Lands.))
Q_LASHO
Parts.N: Has accepted quest and already spoke to Bugsy -> complete quest.

Parts.A:
Ha! HA HA HA! Oh, what an amusing display that was. You should have seen that old fools face. Perhaps now he will realize that he will have to pay the *fair* cut of his earnings he is supposed to pay, in full, to me. Can't have those merchants use my little town free of charge now, can I?

  In any case. You have done your part. Good job.
I could, yes. But it was quite amusing this way.
Parts.B: Bugsy will not trade with me anymore now!

Parts.A:
Oh, is that so? We can't have that now, can we?

  I will instruct him to not refuse any trade anymore. That is a rule. And that little display earlier was to remind him of these rules. I would like to think you were very convincing.

  As for your next task...

Yes, another one. But fear not, this will be your last. Then I shall consider your debt repaid.

  There is a man near the inn, in a room covered in curtains. His name is Netos. He will need your help in acquiring a few specialized goods. Go talk to him, he will tell you the details.
Parts.B: I guess I have no choice...

Parts.A: Q_LASHO
Q_WELCOME
Parts.N: Set welcome quest to task 3 = get the lotus

Parts.A: Q_WELCOME
Why are you still here? Go talk to Netos!
Q_WELCOME
Don't you have work to do? Go get busy!
Q_WELCOME

Welcome back, dear dear friend! We are friends by now, are we not?

  Netos tells me his supplies are replenished again. Now...now we can make this place here a proper organization! All thanks to me, with just a little bit of help from you.
Parts.B: So my debt has been repaid?

Parts.A:
Your debt?

  Oh. Of course. Of course. For now.

I am still entrusted with your life.

  But...I think a little reward is in order. Here. Take this little seal and give it to Hotep downstairs. He will trade you a decently enough weapon for it.

  Surely, you could put that to good use?
Q_WELCOME

You are most welcome!

  Now off you go, go grab your weapon!
Q_WELCOME

Well hello there, Exile!

  I hope you are doing well. Do not worry, I will have a new task for you soon!
